name: AXT, Inc.
description: AXT, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of compound semiconductor substrates, specializing in the production of high-performance materials. Founded in 1986 and headquartered in Fremont, California, AXT has established itself as a key player in the semiconductor industry, focusing on the development and supply of substrates for applications in optoelectronics, wireless communications, and solar energy. The company's product portfolio includes Indium Phosphide (InP), Gallium Antimonide (GaSb), and Gallium Arsenide (GaAs) substrates, which are critical in the production of devices such as lasers, photodetectors, and high-frequency transistors. AXT's commitment to innovation is reflected in its advanced manufacturing processes and stringent quality control measures, ensuring that its products meet the highest industry standards. The company serves a diverse range of customers, from research institutions to leading technology companies, and is dedicated to supporting the growth of the semiconductor industry while addressing global challenges in energy efficiency and sustainability. AXT's mission is to deliver high-quality semiconductor materials that enable the development of cutting-edge technologies and contribute to a more sustainable future.

seo.meta_title: AXT, Inc. | Leading Manufacturer of Compound Semiconductor Substrates
seo.meta_description: Explore AXT, Inc., a premier manufacturer of compound semiconductor substrates, specializing in high-performance materials for optoelectronics and wireless communication.

faq.question: What does AXT, Inc. specialize in?
faq.answer: AXT, Inc. specializes in the manufacturing of compound semiconductor substrates.

faq.question: Where is AXT, Inc. headquartered?
faq.answer: AXT, Inc. is headquartered in Fremont, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of AXT, Inc.?
faq.answer: AXT's main products include Indium Phosphide, Gallium Antimonide, and Gallium Arsenide substrates.
